document.full_text: oil crept back above $121 on wednesday, partly reversing a deep sell-off as foreign ministers met for talks on libya's future and the market awaited u.s. inventory data for possible signs of demand attrition.
document.title: oil edges higher, market monitors libya conflict
lines_and_colors: oil crept back above $121 on wednesday, partly reversing a deep sell-off as foreign ministers met for talks on libya's future and the market awaited u.s. inventory data for possible signs of demand attrition.
